alert.note: Alert for Calvert; Charles; St. Marys (Maryland) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Baltimore/Washington (Washington D.C., Central Maryland, Northern Virginia, Eastern West Virginia)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Watch issued July 12 at 8:00PM EDT until July 12 at 10:00PM EDT by NWS Baltimore/Washington
info.description: SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WATCH 462 REMAINS VALID UNTIL 10 PM EDT THIS EVENING FOR THE FOLLOWING AREAS IN MARYLAND THIS WATCH INCLUDES 3 COUNTIES IN SOUTHERN MARYLAND CALVERT CHARLES ST. MARYS IN VIRGINIA THIS WATCH INCLUDES 16 COUNTIES IN CENTRAL VIRGINIA ALBEMARLE CITY OF CHARLOTTESVILLE CITY OF FREDERICKSBURG GREENE KING GEORGE NELSON ORANGE SPOTSYLVANIA IN NORTHERN VIRGINIA CITY OF MANASSAS CITY OF MANASSAS PARK CULPEPER FAUQUIER PRINCE WILLIAM STAFFORD IN NORTHWEST VIRGINIA MADISON RAPPAHANNOCK THIS INCLUDES THE CITIES OF CALIFORNIA, CHARLOTTESVILLE, CHESAPEAKE BEACH, CROZET, CULPEPER, DAHLGREN, DUNKIRK, FALMOUTH, FREDERICKSBURG, GORDONSVILLE, GREENFIELD, HUNTINGTOWN, LEXINGTON PARK, LUSBY, MADISON, MANASSAS, MANASSAS PARK, NORTH BEACH, ORANGE, PRINCE FREDERICK, SPOTSYLVANIA COURTHOUSE, ST. CHARLES, STANARDSVILLE, WALDORF, WARRENTON, WASHINGTON, AND WOODBRIDGE.
